hanzi-su-wiki:
実

Значения

В самом деле, действительно; плод, суть, содержание; плодоносить; действительный, реальный

Мнемоника

Дом 宀, где собрано большое 大 богатство, и оно всё растёт и растёт (две дополнительные черты).

Варианты

實, 实
purpleculture_pinyin:
shí
Japanese variant of 实
Японский вариант настоящего
rtega_mnemonic:
實實RS
实实		実real, true, honest, sincere
  • From building 宀 and remnant string of coins 头貫: prosperous → real
  • ⓢ folded hands 𡗗 in the house 宀: honest and sincere people： 実 → 实
真 誠; 結; 菓 果; 實

実実RS
X		truth, reality, fruit, bear fruit, fruit
  • the hard reality is only earnest working families 宀 bear fruit and get higher 耒 in society
真 誠; 結; 菓 果
koohiiStory1: Bonsais are grown in a house, away from the harsh reality of the real world where they wouldn´t survive.
koohiiStory2: On this rather boring ´big brother´ type reality show, they have locked up bonsai inside a house and everyone is watching them on TV 24x7. The viewers have to vote on which bonsai shall remain in the house and which one has to leave.
kunYomi: み、みの.る、まこと、まことに、みの、みち.る
jp_example_words:
真実(さな): truth, reality
実(じつ): truth, reality, sincerity, fidelity, kindness, faith, substance, essence
実業家(じつぎょうか): industrialist, businessman
実質(じっしつ): substance, essence
実情(じつじょう): real condition, actual circumstances, actual state of affairs
実践(じっせん): practice, put into practice
実態(じったい): truth, fact
実は(じつは): as a matter of fact, by the way
実費(じっぴ): actual expense, cost price
充実(じゅうじつ): fullness, completion, perfection, substantiality, enrichment
誠実(せいじつ): sincere, honest, faithful
切実(せつじつ): compelling, serious, severe, acute, earnest, pressing, urgent
忠実(ちゅうじつ): fidelity, faithfulness
確実(かくじつ): certainty, reliability, soundness
果実(かじつ): fruit, nut, berry
現実(げんじつ): reality
口実(こうじつ): excuse
事実(じじつ): fact, truth, reality
実感(じっかん): feelings (actual, true)
実験(じっけん): experiment
実現(じつげん): implementation, materialization, realization
実行(じっこう): practice, performance, realization, execution (e.g. program)
実際(じっさい): practical, actual condition, status quo
実施(じっし): enforcement, enact, put into practice, carry out, operation
実習(じっしゅう): practice, training
実績(じっせき): achievements, actual results
実に(じつに): indeed, truly, surely
実物(じつぶつ): real thing, original
実用(じつよう): practical use, utility
実力(じつりょく): merit, efficiency, arms, force
実例(じつれい): example, illustration
実(み): fruit, nut, seed, content, good result
実る(みのる): bear fruit, ripen
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Climb onto the roof in spring to see the truth. The world is waking back up from winter and revealing the reality of what it is all around you.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine sitting comfortably on your roof as the world around you changes to spring. Snow melts and reveals all of the truths that have been obscured and hidden in winter.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: At the moment, you're trying to learn the truth about the deer that is coming out of the snowy woods when you see not one, but two baby deer appear with it! Gee! Two (じつ) babies! You keep looking around and realize that all of the animals seem to have two babies that they had hidden in the snow.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Gee! Two babies! Reality sure is lovely.
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the three men (𡗗) under the roof (宀) are in reality a fruit

Other pronunciations 其它发音: Not exists.

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 實 mutant 実 from building 宀 mián and string-of-cowries 头(贯)貫 guàn C532 實<寔> A226 实[實] new-char 实. (name- prosperous (实)實実 shí)

Decomposition notes 字形分解说明 :
(- 头貫 only appears in 实實) (- 贯貫 in all other places)

Simplification rule : A226 实[實]

Simplification rule explained :
new-char cursive 头貫

Variant rule : C532 實<寔>

Variant rule clarification :
實 (prosperous, real, solid, honest) TW 寔 <real, solid, honest>

Applied rules :

New font rule :

There is no known oracle characters found. 没.

Name meaning

shí
вм. 实
Radicals: 宀  (roof, spring)
Meaning Mnemonic
Climb onto the roof in spring to see the truth. The world is waking back up from winter and revealing the reality of what it is all around you.
Imagine sitting comfortably on your roof as the world around you changes to spring. Snow melts and reveals all of the truths that have been obscured and hidden in winter.
Reading Mnemonic
At the moment, you're trying to learn the truth about the deer that is coming out of the snowy woods when you see not one, but two baby deer appear with it! Gee! Two (じつ) babies! You keep looking around and realize that all of the animals seem to have two babies that they had hidden in the snow.
Gee! Two babies! Reality sure is lovely.
